column1: Data Science and Artificial Intelligence MSc
column5: Discover how tech companies gather and use data and explore both the databases that power our daily lives and the data languages underpinning them on this MSc. You’ll receive a thorough grounding in mathematics and statistics, data mining, artificial intelligence and the fundamentals of programming as you develop a toolkit of skills in data science and emerging technologies.INTRODUCTIONWith organisations increasingly reliant on data science and artificial intelligence (AI), understanding how to analyse, validate and interpret data can significantly enhance your employability.
column7: UK fees (applies to Channel Islands, Isle of Man and Republic of Ireland) Full-time place, per year - £12,100  International fees Full-time place, per year - £26,350
